#Disable warnings for external stuff
add_compile_options("-w")
add_subdirectory(binreloc)
add_subdirectory(dir_monitor)
add_subdirectory(RecastDetour)
add_subdirectory(Remotery)
add_subdirectory(sqlite3pp)
add_subdirectory(tinyxml)
add_subdirectory(utf8)
add_subdirectory(saf)
add_subdirectory(bytesize)
if (NOT WIN32)
    add_subdirectory(libxdg-basedir)
endif ()
